text: While developing a solution using the OAuth 2 client, I noticed there were some variables in base.py that were wrong.  This was causing things like preparing a token refresh request to fail due to an AttributeError.  This simply fixes two of those situations that I've encountered.
title: Some simple fixes for OAuth 2 base client
